document_data.mainbody: Hephaestus was a red dragon who laired in Erlkazar. A fluke of the Spellplague turned him into an undead creature with powers over the denizens of the Shadowfell.This dragon is not to be confused with Velcuthimmorhar, another dragon in novels by R.A. Salvatore who has the nickname "Hephaestus".
